MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh affecting properties in Stenhouse Crescent and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to repair faulty electrical equipment, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:15pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:13pm on the 27th of March 2021.
